facts.name: Coffee
facts.description: Did you know that Finns drink the most coffee per capita in the world? As a result, Helsinki has some great coffee shops and cafesâ€¦

facts.name: Saunas
facts.description: Nobody saunas like the Finns do. If you want to give this a whirl, there are several public saunas in Helsinki that will give you a warm welcome.

facts.name: Oodi
facts.description: If you have some spare time on your hands, you should go check out Oodi, Helsinki's new central library. It was recently chosen as the best new public library in the world.

facts.name: Beers and drinks
facts.description: Thanks to the recent craft beer boom, Helsinki has lots of bars with great beers. Finland is also home to the best gin in the world, Kyro distillery's Napue Gin.
